options.content: NTM - Gaudi Host Monitoring

targets.query: select count(host) from (select last(util) FROM "GaudiMon"  WHERE $timeFilter group by host) where $timeFilter
select count(status) from (select last(status) as status FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by host,bus_id)

select last(Disabled) as "Disabled" from (select count(status) as "Disabled" from (select last(status) as status FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by host,bus_id,time($__interval)) where status != 'Operational' group by time($__interval)) group by time($__interval)

select count(status) as "Operational" from (select last(status) as status FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by host,bus_id,time($__interval)) where status = 'Operational' group by time($__interval)
select count(status) as "Disabled" from (select last(status) as status FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by host,bus_id) where status != 'Operational'
select count(status) as "Operational" from (select last(status) as status FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by host,bus_id) where status = 'Operational'
select status,host,bus_id from (select last(status) as status FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by host,bus_id) where status != 'Operational'
select top(util,bus_id,host,10) from (SELECT max(util) as util  FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by bus_id, host) where $timeFilter
select top(temperature,bus_id,host,10) from (SELECT max(temperature) as temperature FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by bus_id, host) where $timeFilter
select top(mem_used,bus_id,host,10) from (SELECT max(mem)*100/max(mem_max) as mem_used FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by bus_id, host) where $timeFilter
select top(un_ecc,bus_id,host,10) from (SELECT max(un_ecc) as un_ecc FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by bus_id, host) where $timeFilter
SELECT last(uptime) as uptime , last(load1) as load1 FROM "$db"."$rp"."system"  WHERE $timeFilter group by host
SELECT last(total) as total, last(used) as used, last(used)/last(total) as used_percent FROM "$db"."$rp"."mem"  WHERE $timeFilter group by host
select count(last) as interfaces from (select last(bytes_recv) from "$db"."$rp"."net"   WHERE $timeFilter group by interface,host) group by host

SELECT last(cpu_model) as cpu_model,last(driver_version) as driver_version,last(gaudi_model) as gaudi_model,last(num_cpu) as num_cpu,last(os_release) as os_release FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon"  WHERE $timeFilter group by host
select count(last) as num_hpu from (select last from (select last(util) from "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon"   WHERE $timeFilter group by host,bus_id) group by host) group by host
select top(last,1) as disk_used from (SELECT last(used_percent) FROM "autogen"."disk" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY path,host) group by host
SELECT last(temperature) as temperature FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by bus_id, host
SELECT last(un_ecc) as ecc FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by bus_id, host
SELECT last(mem)*100/last(mem_max) as mem_used FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by bus_id, host
SELECT last(util) as util FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by bus_id, host
SELECT last(pwr)*100/last(pwr_max) as pwr_used FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter group by bus_id, host

select State from (SELECT oper_state as "State", last(cdc) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiExtIntf" where "host" !~ /^$unhealthy_hosts$/ and $timeFilter group by host, intf) where $timeFilter group by intf,host

select last(State) from (SELECT oper_state as "State", last(cdc), bus_id as "Bus ID"  FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiExtIntf" where "host" =~ /^$devicename$/ and $timeFilter group by host, intf, peer, peer_name, peer_intf) where $timeFilter group by time($__interval), intf, host, peer, peer_name, peer_intf

select last(State) from (SELECT oper_state as "State", last(cdc), bus_id as "Bus ID"  FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiExtIntf" where "host" =~ /^$devicename$/ and $timeFilter and peer != '' group by host, intf, peer, peer_name, peer_intf) where $timeFilter group by time($__interval), intf, host, peer, peer_name, peer_intf
SELECT last(clock) as clock, last(serial) as serial, last(status) as status FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where "host" =~ /^$devicename$/ and $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id

SELECT max(mem) as mem,max(mem_max) as mem_max, max(mem)*100/max(mem_max) as mem_used,max(pwr) as pwr, max(pwr_max) as pwr_max, max(pwr)*100/max(pwr_max) as pwr_used, max(temperature) as temperature, max(un_ecc) as un_ecc, max(util) as util FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" where $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$devicename$/ group by oam_id,bus_id
SELECT last(pwr) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,time($__interval)
SELECT last(mem) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,time($__interval)
SELECT last(temperature) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,time($__interval)
SELECT last(util) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,time($__interval)
SELECT max(un_ecc) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiMon" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id, time($__interval)

select max("RX Traffic") as "RX Traffic" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(OctetsReceivedOK)*8/elapsed(OctetsReceivedOK,1s) as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiIntIntf" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,intf, host) where $timeFilter GROUP BY oam_id,bus_id,intf, host, time($__interval)

select max("TX Traffic") as "TX Traffic" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(OctetsTransmittedOK)*8/elapsed(OctetsTransmittedOK,1s) as "TX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiIntIntf" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,intf, host) where $timeFilter GROUP BY oam_id,bus_id,intf, host,time($__interval)

select max("non_negative_difference") as "pcs_local_faults" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(pcs_local_faults) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiIntIntf" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,intf, host) where $timeFilter GROUP BY oam_id,bus_id,intf, host, time($__interval)

select max("non_negative_difference") as "pcs_remote_faults" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(pcs_remote_faults) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiIntIntf" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,intf, host) where $timeFilter GROUP BY oam_id,bus_id,intf, host, time($__interval)

select max("non_negative_difference") as "pcs_remote_fault_reconfig" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(pcs_remote_fault_reconfig) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiIntIntf" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,intf, host) where $timeFilter GROUP BY oam_id,bus_id,intf, host, time($__interval)

select max("non_negative_difference") as "pcs_link_restores" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(pcs_link_restores) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiIntIntf" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,intf, host) where $timeFilter GROUP BY oam_id,bus_id,intf, host, time($__interval)

select max("non_negative_difference") as "aAlignmentErrors" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(aAlignmentErrors) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiIntIntf" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,intf, host) where $timeFilter GROUP BY oam_id,bus_id,intf, host, time($__interval)

panels.title: Errors - pcs_local_faults, pcs_remote_faults, pcs_remote_fault_reconfig, pcs_link_restores, and aAlignmentErrors

targets.query: select max("non_negative_difference") as "spmu_req_out_of_range_psn" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(spmu_req_out_of_range_psn) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiIntIntf" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by oam_id,bus_id,intf,host) where $timeFilter GROUP BY oam_id,bus_id,intf,host, time($__interval)

panels.title: Errors - spmu_req_out_of_range_psn, spmu_req_unset_psn, spmu_res_duplicate_psn, and spmu_res_out_of_sequence_psn

value.title: Details of ${__data.fields["Peer Interface"]} on the Switch ${__data.fields["Peer Name"]}

targets.query: SELECT last(mac) as MAC, oper_speed as "Speed", oper_state as "State",peer as "Peer IP",peer_type as "Peer Type",peer_intf as "Peer Interface",peer_name as "Peer Name"  FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiExtIntf" where "host" =~ /^$devicename$/ group by host,bus_id, oam_id, intf

select max("RX Traffic") as "RX Traffic" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(OctetsReceivedOK)*8/elapsed(OctetsReceivedOK,1s) as "RX Traffic" FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiExtIntf" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by host,intf,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY host,intf,peer_name,peer_intf, time($__interval)

select max("non_negative_difference") as "C0" from (SELECT non_negative_difference(aCBFCPAUSEFramesReceived_0) FROM "$db"."$rp"."GaudiExtIntf" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$devicename$/) AND $timeFilter group by host,intf,peer_name,peer_intf) where $timeFilter GROUP BY host,intf,peer_name,peer_intf, time($__interval)
